Message:
A giant bud began to surge
from the research facility,
spreading its viny tendrils
across the campus.

This level of rapid growth
can’t be possible with just
the plant’s power alone.

Don’t tell me that what
once brought this country
to the verge of ruin was...!

If that’s the case,
then the only ones who can
put a stop to this are the ones
who researched its origins—
Meria and I.
I slowly relaxed my clenched fists.
If Meria is inside of that bud, then...
there’s only one way to save her.

Meria had that plant put
inside her of her own volition.

I don’t know why she did
such a thing...

But, I won’t let you
go and die on me...

...without so much as
considering how I feel...!
